mapper.insert: insert into goods_table(goods_name, goods_price, goods_size, goods_detail, goods_type, goods_weight, create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{goodsName},#{goodsPrice},#{goodsSize},#{goodsDetail},#{goodsType},#{goodsWeight},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update goods_table set goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_detail = #{goodsDetail}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
